amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following section: SEC. 4. REPORT ON EFFECT ON JOBS. Not later than 180 days after the date of enactment of this Act, the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall transmit to Congress a report estimating the increase or decrease in the number of jobs in the United States that will occur as a result of the enactment of this Act (including the amendment to the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7401 et seq.) made by section 3 of this Act).

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Green, Al.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 247 (Roll no. 910).
